description: The Sabre LT Pant delivers freeride performance with full weather protection and lightweight versatility. The freeride-specific design and regular fit are optimized by articulation for freedom of movement on traverses and descents. Made from N80p Gore-Tex with C-Knit™ backer technology the Sabre LT Pant is waterproof, breathable and supple. Durable 100D Cordura® PowderCuffs™ seal out snow and fit under snowboard highbacks, and Keprotec™ instep patches prevent abrasion and ski cuts. Integrated Slide’n Loc™ attachments link with compatible jackets to create a unified clothing system that moves with the body and helps seal out snow.
name: Arcteryx Sabre LT Pants, Reg - Mens
